organization.description:
Weather, temperature, carbon, water, soil and all other kinds of climate related open data.  Including (but not limited to) data about:

 * the atmosphere
 * the weather
 * air quality
 * temperature
 * the ocean
 * rivers
 * water levels
 * water quality
 * carbon emissions
 * pollution
 * soil erosion
 * biodiversity

For background information see [blog on article on IPCC data](http://blog.okfn.org/2007/11/20/the-ipcc-data-distribution-centre-environmental-data-licensing/), [the wiki](http://wiki.okfn.org/OpenEnvironmentalData), and [this other blog article](http://blog.okfn.org/2009/12/05/climate-change-climate-sceptics-and-open-data/). If you would like to help update or maintain this group, please [get in touch](http://okfn.org/contact)!

The climate data group is supported by the [Open Knowledge Foundation](http://www.okfn.org), [Clear Climate Code](http://clearclimatecode.org/) and the scientists at [Real Climate](http://www.realclimate.org/).

### Existing Lists of Climate Datasets to Migrate Here

 * <http://www.realclimate.org/index.php/data-sources/>
 * <http://ergodd.zoo.ox.ac.uk/eden/index.php?p=10>
 * <http://wiki.okfn.org/OpenEnvironmentalData/DatabaseOfEmissionsData>
 * <http://wiki.okfn.org/OpenEnvironmentalData>
organization.title: Climate Data
organization.name: climatedata

name: eea-dataservice
notes:
### About

Overview:

> The data service provides almost all data sets and applications which have been used in EEA's periodical environmental reports.

Topics include:

 * Air emissions
 * Air quality
 * Corine land cover 1990
 * Corine land cover 2000
 * EEA owned data sets
 * Land cover accounts
 * Eurosion
 * Nationally designated areas
 * Point data
 * Raster data
 * Geospatial data
 * Vector data
 * Waterbase
 * Wise

### Access

No bulk download, but the following URL displays all available datasets (114 at time of writing) at a time, by instructing website to display 10000 results at a time (change URL below to change number):

  * <http://www.eea.europa.eu/data-and-maps/data#c5=all&c0=10000&b_start=0>

### Openness

EEA [copyright notice](http://www.eea.europa.eu/legal/copyright) says:

> Unless otherwise indicated, the information available from this site is within the public domain. Public domain information on the EEA web pages may be downloaded free of charge, and reproduced provided the source is acknowledged*.

> However, this site also contains a substantial amount of material, such as full text of reports and summaries, fact-sheets, datasets and databases, which is copyright protected and is marked as such. For such material, the agency as copyright holder retains the rights for reproduction or redistribution.
title: EEA - Data service
